entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: ESE 32 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
